about_the_game:
Welcome to "Garden Paradise", a game focused on leisure and relaxation. Here, you can design your ideal garden by dragging and placing various units. Whether you want to create a peaceful flower garden or a lively outdoor entertainment area, this game can fulfill your design needs.

The gameplay of "Garden Paradise" is very simple yet enjoyable. The game randomly generates various units, which you can drag and drop to the designated positions to implement your garden design.

The game offers a wide variety of unit types for you to freely combine:
Ground: Basic paving units that define the basic outline of the garden.
Vegetable Patch: Where you can grow various vegetables and flowers, adding a natural atmosphere.
Pond: Adding water elements to make the garden more lively.
House: The core building of the garden, which can be a small cottage or a villa.
Fountain: Decorative water feature that enhances the aesthetics of the garden.
Tables and Chairs: Furniture for rest and entertainment.
Fences: Divide the garden area and increase privacy.
Well: Traditional element that adds a rustic charm.
Other small items: Enrich the details of the garden, such as lanterns, flower pots, etc.
……

In addition to simple dragging and placing, some units in the game also have interactive functions:
Rotation: Most units can be rotated, making it convenient for you to arrange them from different angles.
Lamp: Can be turned on and off, creating different lighting effects.
Piggy Bank: Can save game data, ensuring that your design is not lost.
Color Palette: Can change the background color, making your garden design more personalized.
……

name: Garden Paradise

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 10100 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 or AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 12400 or AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 3060 or AMD Radeon RX 6600XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 100 GB available space

short_description: "Garden Paradise" is a casual and relaxing game that you can freely design your ideal garden by dragging and placing various units. The game offers a wide variety of unit types and you combine these elements to create unique garden layouts.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
